title: Hour 1: Beard Science
description:
In this episode, Chris "Mad Dog" Russo, Courtney Cronin, and Brian Windhorst debate whether or not the 76ers are a contender in the East if James Harden decides to re-sign with the team. Staying in the NBA's Eastern Conference, the crew is joined by Freddie Coleman to discuss which team is the biggest dark horse heading into the season. Also, Chris, Brian, and Freddie ask the question: Should Lebron want an extension with the Lakers? Booger McFarland joins the show to debate if the Eagles are an All-Star team and if the Dallas Cowboys will win a playoff game this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Are the 76ers contenders in the East if Harden re-signs?
